card_text: This card's name becomes "Shiranui Style Synthesis" while it is in the Spell & Trap Zone. Once per turn: You can activate 1 of these effects.$N●Banish 1 face-up Zombie-Type monster you control; you take no damage this turn (even if this card leaves the field).$N●Target 2 of your banished Zombie-Type monsters with 0 DEF; shuffle them both into the Deck, then draw 1 card.
